ctx: eapply is_lim_seq_ext with (v := fun n => u (S n)).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: eapply is_lim_seq_ext with (v := fun n => u (S n)).
exceptions.tactic: eapply is_lim_seq_ext with (v := fun n => u (S n)).
exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R l : Rbar H : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => u (S n)) l P : R -> Prop r : Rbar_locally ?M2376 P Unable to unify "filtermap (fun n : nat => u (S n)) eventually P" with "filtermap u eventually P".

original: intros u l. split. - intros H. eapply is_lim_seq_ext with (v := fun n => u (S n)). intros n. reflexivity. auto. - intros H. eapply is_lim_seq_ext with (v := fun n => u (S n)). intros n. reflexivity. auto.
